name: The Old Tower
atmosphere: Large stone walls surround you. Torches, lit by some magical incantation, flicker slowly and cast ominous shadows.
Stone walls enclose a dimly lit set of corridoors and rooms. Ancient containers and vases are strewn about, and the dried skeletons of long-dead adventurers lay against the walls.
Dimly lit, torn and dilapidated tapestries line stone walls. What little light there is flickers around you.
